title: [Animation] Shadowfire Kindred's channel animation for Dominion.
body: When channeling to convert the turrets in Dominion, Lamb will do the wind-up, before suddenly standing upright while holding her bow towards the ground in an idle stance. Not sure if this is meant to be the proper stance... plus, the channel point changes from lamb's hand to her feet.

replies.body:
Hey RBrim08,

Thanks for the report! This is working as intended.
that's her channel animation? Are you... sure?

Ooops! 

I'm looking ahead on this one. The issue has been fixed, but you're right, it's currently busted on live. :x Sorry for the confusion there!
